name: Blade Strangers
description: A malevolent force known only as Lina is devouring data from a vast, interdimensional network of servers overseen by sentient computers called ”motes.” In desperation, the motes summon heroes from a variety of parallel game worlds to face off against each other in one-on-one combat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 compliant video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Additional Notes: Controller recommended
